501.name: Red Potion
501.desc: A potion made from grinded Red Herbs that restores about 45 HP.

502.name: Orange Potion
502.desc: A potion made from grinded Red and Yellow Herbs that restores about 105 HP.

503.name: Yellow Potion
503.desc: A potion made from grinded Yellow Herbs that restores about 175 HP.

504.name: White Potion
504.desc: A potion made from grinded White Herbs that restores about 325 HP.

505.name: Blue Potion
505.desc: A potion made from grinded Blue Herbs that restores about 60 SP.

506.name: Green Potion
506.desc: A potion which cures Poison, Silence, Blind and Chaos effects.

601.name: Fly Wing
601.desc: An enchanted fly's wing that instantly sends its user to a random spot when waved in the air. Instant teleport.

602.name: Butterfly Wing
602.desc: An enchanted butterfly's wing that instantly sends its user to his Save Point when waved in the air. Instant teleport to character's Save Point.

603.name: Old Blue Box
603.desc: A mysterious blue box that seems to hold something inside, but you'll have to open it to find out.

909.name: Jellopy
909.desc: A small crystallization created by some monsters.

910.name: Garlet
910.desc: A small crystallization created by some monsters.

911.name: Scell
911.desc: A small crystallization created by some monsters.

912.name: Zargon
912.desc: A small crystallization created by some monsters.
